products.name: Full Size Football
products.description: Enhance your sports collection with our Full-size PVC Soccer Ball. Crafted for endurance and optimal ball control, each ball showcases an eye-catching design, ensuring it stands out during play. The diverse color options add a unique flair to your game, though please note colors may vary with each order. Tailored for players of all levels, this soccer ball is a fit for competitive matches, training sessions, and recreational use alike. Its robust build is meant to endure vigorous play across various surfaces. Charge into your next game equipped with a soccer ball that promises consistent performance and a touch of style. Remember, the ball will arrive deflated and color selection is random, offering a surprise with every purchase.

products.name: Tennis Balls - 3
products.description: A high quality and consistent ball for longtime play at beach or courts, the ball is fuzzy, motion slow and shock reduce, especially great choice for the beginner or training, or playing in a harsh environment. Improved bright green color for a better tone contrast that allows players to track spin easier. Well, also easy to find when fall into sand rock or fly out of the playing area.

products.name: Netball
products.description: A perfect netball for entry level players at club, school or for practice in the back garden. This training ball has been made for outdoor use with a hard wearing rubber surface. In addition, the butyl bladder offers maximum air retention so your netball stays inflated for as long as possible. Available in size 5 and 4 this is the perfect training ball for beginners.

products.name: Basketball
products.description: The Wilson NBA AUTHENTIC INDOOR-OUTDOOR basketball is an indoor and outdoor basketball ball that uses high-performance composite leather to bring out the authentic NBA leather feel.

products.name: Boxing Gloves
products.description: These boxing gloves are made of artificial leather and are much stronger than the usual PVC gloves. A wide wrist band gives you good support and combined with our hand wraps, these gloves feel like a natural extension of your fists. Sizes range from 8oz to 12oz. Also available in genuine leather for those students who canâ€™t get enough of Martial Arts.

products.name: Cover Fix
products.description: Refusing to be boxed into one category, these drops are somehow a single piece of makeup and a part of all makeup at once. You can dab some on your face as a highlighter, mix the drops into your face makeup for a universal glow, or use one of the bronzing colors to look more sun-kissed.

products.name: Facial Sheet Mask 12 Combo
products.description: Experience the difference with our 12-set supreme collection of sheet masks, treasuring natural beauty and ingredients and designed for all skin types and concerns

products.name: The 48 Laws of Power
products.description: Amoral, cunning, ruthless, and instructive, this bestselling work distills 3,000 years of the history of power into 48 well-explicated laws. As attention-grabbing in its design as it is in content, this bold volume outlines the laws of power in them

products.name: The School of Life: An Emotional Education
products.description:
This book brings together ten years of essential and transformative research on emotional intelligence, with practical topics including:

- how to understand yourself
- how to master the dilemmas of relationships
- how to become more effective at work
- how to endure failure
- how to grow more serene and resilient

products.name: 20m Led Lights Bluetooth RGB Lights Led Tape Lights
products.description: Ultra Long Strip Lights 20M2x10m) led strip lights are long enough to reach around your entire room and light the whole place up, cuttable design allows you to adjust the length of led lights however you like, for bedroom, living room, cabinet, party, christmas, etcMulti Control Method LED light strip can control via APP, 44 key IR remoter. Multicolors with the APP, and easy to use the 44 key remoter or control box to set the brightness, speed, color, static, dynamic mode, etc. Multi control method was available to pocketable & Easy Install LED strip lights are cuttable between every 3 LEDs, to allow you to DIY any shapes for different needs. The self-adhesive tape can be fit on any dry and flat surface, easy to install anywhere you want. Smart Timer Function Memory Function Can preset the time and color to switch lights on/off automatically at any particular time, helps to control lights time and save energy. The memory function will auto keep the last use mode when you turn it back on. Built-in Highly Sensitive Mic the Built-in sensitive mic will detect the music, or you speak volume to change the color and speed.
